project_abstract.cdata: The Fourth Development Finance Companies Project will provide financing of development in Colombia through credits and other investments for productive purposes to privately controlled enterprises, for specific projects in accordance with the Estatutos of the Financieras. The Bank loan will cover the direct foreign exchange cost of the projects.
